unpublished.center: MEMORANDUM OF DECISION AND JUDGMENT AFTER TRIAL

opinion_text.unpublished:
After considering the testimony of the representative of the plaintiff and the testimony of the defendant and having viewed the exhibits, submitted by the plaintiff only, the court finds the issues for the plaintiff.
Therefore, judgment may enter in favor of the plaintiff as against the defendant in the amount of $13,658.27, in addition to costs to be taxed by the clerk upon plaintiff's submission of a bill of costs. The court awards to the plaintiff, the sum of $2,048.74 as attorney fees, which the court finds to be reasonable.
The total judgment in the amount of $15,707.01 plus costs shall be paid by the plaintiff to the offices of Abraham M. Hoffman, Esq. 4154 Madison Ave., Trumbull, CT 06611 at the rate of $35.00 per week, commencing April 1, 2009.
